Name: team_size_limit
Description: The team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: blocker_severity_high
Description: Blockers with severity "high" must be resolved within 2 days

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Only features with priority "high" can be included in the current sprint

Name: worker_availability
Description: Only workers with status "available" can be assigned to tasks

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Each task must be assigned to a worker with the required skill

Name: product_backlog_status
Description: Only product backlogs with status "approved" can be used for sprint planning

Name: sprint_goal_achievable
Description: The sprint goal must be achievable with the selected user stories

Name: release_plan_status
Description: Only release plans with status "confirmed" can be executed

Name: scrum_board_columns
Description: Scrum board must have at least 3 columns (ToDo

Name: velocity_trend_positive
Description: Velocity trend must be positive over the last 3 sprints

Name: roadmap_milestones
Description: All milestones in the roadmap must be assigned to a release plan

Name: stakeholder_influence
Description: Stakeholders with influence level "high" must be invited to sprint reviews

Name: documentation_completeness
Description: Every feature must have associated documentation

Name: budget_constraint
Description: Project budget must not exceed the planned budget
